TopicTitle: New Bug Tracker for KSP2 or are we going to be using the old one?

Articles.Content:
I am thinking KSP2 is going to be amazing with few bugs, optimization. Its going to be a dream. 

The many craft configurations, the countless PC configurations means we are going to have some issues.

Less than KSP1, but nothing is perfect

So perhaps a new bug tracker might help?

1 hour ago, Anth12 said:

I am thinking KSP2 is going to be amazing with few bugs, optimization. Its going to be a dream. 

The many craft configurations, the countless PC configurations means we are going to have some issues.

Less than KSP1, but nothing is perfect

So perhaps a new bug tracker might help?

Considering how KSP 1 isn't getting any updates anymore, the KSP 1 bug tracker would become obselete. Chances are that they will share the same bug tracker.
Chances are there won't even be a publicly available bug tracker.

8 hours ago, MechBFP said:

Chances are there won't even be a publicly available bug tracker.

Lets hope the game is that solid

3 hours ago, Anth12 said:

Lets hope the game is that solid

I hope so too, but even if it isn't I still doubt we will see a public bug tracker. Maybe a feedback site, similar to what Satisfactory does (although I doubt it), but certainly not a classic bug tracker like for KSP.
